Make a list object to record input parameters.

```{r }
params_ls <- params
```

Set a seed.

```{r}
set.seed(params_ls$seed_1L_int)
```

Make a list object to record the configuration of our analysis environment.

```{r}
session_data_ls <- sessionInfo()
```
